summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackHSA/FSA eligibleDermalogica's Dynamic Skin Recovery Moisturizer SPF 50 is a medium-weight, emollient daily moisturizer with broad spectrum SPF 50 that encourages firmness, elasticity and hydration while helping to defend against the primary triggers of skin aging.
details: DetailsBenefitsMedium-weight SPF 50 moisturizer helps neutralize free radical pollutionImproves skin's complexionAs an active sunscreen, it protects against UVA and UVB raysThis collagen stimulating blend promotes strong skin elasticity, firmness, and blends smoothly into skin to create a perfectly hydrated base for makeupProvides long-lasting hydrationSuggested for those with balanced, dry and combination skin typesSuggested for those with concerns of fine lines, wrinkles, dryness, loss of firmness and elasticityKey IngredientsBroad-Spectrum SPF 50: protects skin from UVA and UVB raysPolypeptide Blend: stimulates collagen and firms skinWhite Tea Extract: minimizes the appearance of skin agingSqualane: helps moisturize and improve moisture barrierFormulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesSynthetic FragranceItem 2588996How To UseAfter cleansing and toning, apply a generous amount to face and neck, preferably 30 minutes prior to sun exposure.Precautions: For external use only. Do not use on damaged or broken skin. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, flush with water. Apply prior to sun exposure and reapply often. Discontinue use if skin irritation develops. Do not use on infants under 6 months.IngredientsActive: Avobenzone (3.0%), Homosalate (5.0%), Octisalate (3.0%), Octocrylene (7.0%). Inactive: Water/Aqua/Eau, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Oleosomes, Butylene Glycol, Dimethicone, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Propanediol, Polysorbate 80, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Aniba Rosodora (Rosewood) Wood Oil, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove) Leaf Oil, Saccharomyces Cerevisiae Extract, Laminaria Digitata Extract, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Eugenia Caryophyllus (Clove) Bud Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Cymbopogon Schoenanthus Oil, Cymbopogon Martini Oil, Cupressus Sempervirens Leaf Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Extract, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil, Tocopherol, Squalane, Caprylyl Glycol, Carnosine, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Lecithin, Urea, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Bisabolol, Glucosamine HCl, Ethylhexylglycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Gluconolactone, Polysorbate 60, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Decyl Glucoside, Aminomethyl Propanol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Polysilicone-11, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer, Phenethyl Alcohol, Sodium Benzoate, Linalool, Eugenol, Limonene, Citronellol, Geraniol, Benzyl Benzoate, Citral, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: After cleansing and toning, apply a generous amount to face and neck, preferably 30 minutes prior to sun exposure.Precautions: For external use only. Do not use on damaged or broken skin. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, flush with water. Apply prior to sun exposure and reapply often. Discontinue use if skin irritation develops. Do not use on infants under 6 months.

reviews.headline: I use this fabulous moisturizer every day.
reviews.comments: This spf 50 is amazing. And a great light fragrance

reviews.headline: Would repurchase
reviews.comments: I tried the sample size and loved it. When I saw the minis were BOGO, I purchased it because I loved having a smaller size to carry with me in my purse and work bag. I'd definitely repurchase this SPF again. I have sensitive skin and this doesn't irritate it or have a weird scent.

reviews.headline: Mix feeling!
reviews.comments: This Moisturizer was perfect for me in the weather ( Purchased in March 2025). This summer, every time I used it, within 1-2 hours eyes are burning me ( I work in a room with no sound light). I will be going back to trader joe daily sunscreen.

reviews.headline: Incredible product
reviews.comments:
I used to have patches of dark skin on my forehead and upper lip. I realized after a couple months of using this that my patches were fading. 
I've used this product for several years now and no longer have the dark patches. I will not go without this product. It provides fantastic sun protection as well. I spend a lot if time by the pool and rely on this for my face spf. It has worked wonderfully.

reviews.headline: Must Have to keep skin looking young
reviews.comments: Great product, absorbs quickly, non greasy formula

reviews.headline: Just ok!
reviews.comments: This cream is not like my favorite‚Äî Lanc√¥me Renergie HPN 300, but ok. I tried it because the Lanc√¥me is getting very pricey. It's a bit thicker and has hardly any scent but doesn't have all the great ingredients like the Lanc√¥me.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again and again there's n
reviews.comments: I do recommend this product to my friends and families and anyone that I can

reviews.headline: My Skin Loves
reviews.comments: I have tried so many products for my dry skin from inexpensive to expensive.  There's something my skin loves about Dermalogica products, this one included!

reviews.headline: Great sunscreen
reviews.comments: Love this product.  Been using for years.  Plays well with skin care and make up!

reviews.headline: So pleasantly surprised by this product!
reviews.comments: I was just looking for a sunscreen when I came upon this, but the moisturizer aspect is incredible and makes my skin feel so noticeably soft and I had an almost glow even hours after I've put it on. I wish I'd known about this product years ago. I hope they don't change it!

reviews.headline: This one's a miss
reviews.comments: On my quest to find a good sunscreen after 30 years of not being diligent about using it, (i know shame on me), this Dermalogica Skin Recovery was unfortunately a miss. The smell is extrnely strong and herbal. Not horrible on its own, but add that it burned my face and left it greasy and red for awhile, i cant be continuing to use it. Like the high spf, but i think the lesson for me, personally, is that mineral sunscreen is the way to go since rhe chemical sunscreens seem to make my seemingly mild rosacea that i had under control, just completly inflamed again.

reviews.headline: eye irritation
reviews.comments: The smell and texture was nice and moisturizing, I loved it upon application. However 3 hours later under the sun, the sunscreen start stinging my eyes, my friend who also applied it also got the burning sensation in his eyes. It did not go away until I putting settling powder around mine and his eyes. So use with caution, I barely get eye irritation from sunscreen and this one gave me a headache.

reviews.headline: Wonderful feel
reviews.comments: This is a great product gives my face a wonderful feel

reviews.headline: Love the product not the price
reviews.comments: I love everything about this moisturizer except for how expensive it is! I will say its worth it.ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Smells good

reviews.headline: It's fabulous!!!
reviews.comments: It's fabulous!!!

reviews.headline: Great Daytime Moisturizer
reviews.comments: I keep buying this. It absorbs great and causes no irritation. Just a nice daytime moisturizer.

reviews.headline: Obsessed
reviews.comments: This moisturizer is the absolute best I have used in years. Even with the SPF, which is a bonus, I would wear this around the clock. It feels like velvet going on your skin, and feels so divine. Very moisturizing without leaving behind any feeling.Absolutely so comfortable to wear.

reviews.headline: Hands down the best sunscreen moisturizer made
reviews.comments: I have been using this for 8 years i love that is a moisturizer with sunscreen and believe i apply once and never get burned. It gives your skin a health glow without looking sticky, shiny. I hope they never discontinue making. Try it you love it. My daughter also uses and she has acne prone skin and she also loves it

reviews.headline: GREAT for fair-skinned, sweaty people
reviews.comments: I am a redhead so lord knows I need sunscreen every day but I sweat more than anyone I know. If its remotely humid and I put sunscreen on, it acts like a greenhouse effect for my face. I also HATE the smell of sunscreen. I have been trying to track down a sunscreen that doesn't smell gross and also doesn't make me sweat for 6 years and I finally found it. I never review products but this has blown me away I had to review. It's a hefty pricetag, but for someone who needs sunscreen and who sweats like I do this was an absolute game changer.

faceoff_positive.comments:
Well, it's official! I AM Age Smart!
Yesterday, my esthetician began speaking to me, implying I was in my 20's--I was proud to report I just turned 38 last Monday! (true story).
Don't be skeptical ladies, it's NOT genetics... it's DERMALOGICA! This product is so versitile. It certainly does it's job in the 'age' department--what a perfect, line free glow after years of damage--but please do not limit Age Smart to aging skin. I have acne-prone combination skin; sun damaged, and underhydrated. Everyone always insisted I use oil-free/oil control lotion--but to my surprise, I stumbled upon Age Smart Dynamic Recovery after a very bad sunburn. I now use Age Smart year-round. Age Smart dynamic recovery brings my skin back to life! Non-pore clogging, no breakouts, works wonders under my mineral foundation while allowing me SPF on my face--SPF on MY face? Unheard of! Dermalogica stumped me with this one! Age Smart goes against everything I would expect from a product which is not formulated for acne prone skin. Use after Age Smart Skin Resurfacing cleanser and you will be AMAZED at your even-toned, smooth, hydrated, photo-ready, confidence-building complexion. "You're never too young to be Age Smart." So don't be afraid to pull out those free samples from your last Dermalogica purchase--I'm so glad I did.
faceoff_positive.headline: Step right up!...Betcha can't guess my age

faceoff_negative.comments:
I've used other Dermalogica products and had no problems, however after starting to use the dynamic skin recovery I started to develop eczema on my eyelids so have had to discontinue use.

I'm told that I have sensitive skin so maybe that is the cause. The actual product if very light, has a nice smell and would be awesome if I didn't have the skin irritation.
faceoff_negative.headline: Developed sensitivity
